reviewText: The other review of this dvd is idiotic , of course this is black and white ,and of course the quality is not supreme. It is archive material after all. You expected technicolor pristine footage of Fats Waller ?  What makes this dvd unwatchable is that the screen shrinks down to a quarter of the size every 30 seconds or so , so you can read some crap that they have randomly put on the screen behind some odd animation . How's that for archival presentation ? Totally lame . Buy this footage elsewhere.
just received the archive jazz today...it is so,so bad black & white no color  ugley everything......this is plain junk  jack glasman
